  • Queueì— ìˆ«ìë¥¼ í•˜ë‚˜ì”© ë„£ê³  ë‹¤ìŒ ìˆ«ìë“¤ì„ í•˜ë‚˜ì”© ë¼ì›Œì„œ ì…ë ¥ë°›ì€ ê¸¸ì´ ë§Œí¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ë³´ëŠ” ë¬¸ì œë‹¤.
  • ë°›ì€ ìˆ«ì ë‹¤ìŒ êº¼ë‚¸ ìˆ«ìê°€ ë°›ì€ ìˆ«ìë³´ë‹¤ ì»¤ì•¼ ê·¸ ë‹¤ìŒ ìˆ«ìë¥¼ ë¼ì›Œë³¸ë‹¤.
  • ì¬ê·€ë¡œ ëŒë©´ì„œ ë¼ì›Œì„œ 6ê°œê°€ ë˜ë©´ ì¶œë ¥í•œë‹¤.
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
import java.util.LinkedList;
import java.util.Queue;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;

public class Main {
    static BufferedReader br;
    static BufferedWriter bw;
    static int n;//ì…ë ¥ê¸¸ì´
    static Queue<Integer> q;//ì…ë ¥ ë°›ì€ ìˆ«ìë“¤ì„ ë‹´ëŠ” í
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        bw = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out));
        String input = br.readLine();
        while(!input.equals("0")){//ì…ë ¥ë°›ì€ ë¬¸ìì—´ì´ 0ì´ ì•„ë‹ë•Œ ë°˜ë³µ
            StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(input);//ë„ì›Œì“°ê¸°ë¡œ êµ¬ë¶„í•˜ì—¬ í•˜ë‚˜ì”© êº¼ë‚´ì£¼ëŠ” StringTokenizerë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©
            n = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
            q = new LinkedList<Integer>();//í ì„ ì–¸
            while(st.hasMoreTokens()){//íì— ì…ë ¥ë°›ì€ ìˆ«ìë“¤ì„ ì „ë¶€ ì§‘ì–´ ë„£ëŠ”ë‹¤
                q.add(Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken()));
            }
            permutation("",0,0);//ì¡°í•© í•¨ìˆ˜ ì‹¤í–‰, ë¹ˆë¬¸ìì—´ê³¼ ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ ë°›ì€ ìˆ«ìë¥¼ 0ìœ¼ë¡œ ë„£ëŠ”ë‹¤ ë“¤ì–´ê°„ ìˆ«ìê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ ê°¯ìˆ˜ë„ 0
            input = br.readLine();

            bw.newLine();
        }

        bw.flush();
    }

    //ì¡°í•©í•¨ìˆ˜, ì§ì „ì˜ ë¬¸ìì—´ê³¼ ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ìœ¼ë¡œ ì…ë ¥ ë°›ì€ ìˆ«ì ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ìˆ«ì ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ ê°¯ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë°›ëŠ”ë‹¤.
    public static void permutation(String num, int lastNUM,int index) throws IOException{
        if(index==6){//6ê°œì˜ ì¡°í•©ì¼ ê²½ìš° ì¶œë ¥í•˜ê³  í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì¢…ë£Œí•œë‹¤.
            bw.write(num+"\n");
            return;
        }
        for(int i=index;i<n;i++){//í˜„ì¬ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ ê°¯ìˆ˜ì—ì„œ ì…ë ¥ ë°›ì€ ê°¯ìˆ˜-1ê¹Œì§€ ë°˜ë³µ
            int next = q.poll();//íì—ì„œ ë‹¤ìŒ ìˆ«ìë¥¼ í•˜ë‚˜ êº¼ë‚¸ë‹¤.
            if(lastNUM<next){// ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ ìˆ«ì ë³´ë‹¤ ë‹¤ìŒ ìˆ«ìê°€ í´ ê²½ìš° ì¡°í•©í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì‹¤í–‰
                permutation(num+(index==0?"":" ")+next,next,index+1);
            }
            q.add(next);//ì‚¬ìš©í•œ ìˆ«ìëŠ” ë‹¤ì‹œ íì˜ ë’¤ìª½ì— ë„£ì–´ì„œ ì¬ì‚¬ìš©í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆê²Œ ë§Œë“ ë‹¤.
        }
    }
}

  • ì†Œê´„í˜¸ì™€ ëŒ€ê´„í˜¸ê°€ ëŒ€ì¹­ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë“¤ì–´ìˆëŠ”ê°€ì— ëŒ€í•œ ë¬¸ì œë‹¤.
  • ì²˜ìŒ í’€ì´ëŠ” ìŠ¤íƒì— ([ì„ ë„£ê³  )]ì´ ë‚˜ì˜¬ë•Œ ìŠ¤íƒì˜ ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ ê°’ê³¼ ëŒ€ì¹­í•˜ëŠ”ì§€, ìŠ¤íƒì´ 0ë³´ë‹¤ ì‘ì€ë° )]ì´ ë‚˜ì˜¤ëŠ”ê²Œ ì•„ë‹Œì§€ ì¡°ê±´ì„ ì¤˜ì„œ í’€ì—ˆë‹¤.

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
import java.util.Stack;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out));

        //ì…ë ¥ì€ í•œë²ˆ ë¨¼ì € ë°›ê³  ì‹œì‘í•œë‹¤.
        String input = br.readLine();
        Stack<Character> stack = null;
        while (true) {
            //ê²°ê³¼ê°’ ì œì–´ë¥¼ ìœ„í•œ flag, trueë©´ yesë¥¼ falseë©´ noë¥¼ ì¶œë ¥í•˜ê²Œ ë§Œë“¤ê±°ë‹¤.
            boolean flag = true;
            stack = new Stack<Character>();
            //ë¹ ë¥¸ íƒìƒ‰ì„ ìœ„í•´ char[]ë¡œ ë³€ê²½í•˜ì—¬ ë°˜ë³µ
            for (char c : input.toCharArray()) {
                //stackì— ì—¬ëŠ” ê´„í˜¸ë§Œ ë„£ëŠ”ë‹¤.
                if ("([".contains(c + "")) {
                    stack.push(c);

                //ë‹«íŒ ê´„í˜¸ê°€ ë‚˜ì™”ì„ë•Œ ìŠ¤íƒì˜ ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ ê°’ê³¼ ë¹„êµí•˜ì—¬ ë§ì§€ ì•Šì„ ê²½ìš° ë˜ëŠ”
                //stackì´ ë¹„ì–´ìˆëŠ”ë° ë‹«íŒ ê´„í˜¸ê°€ ë‚˜ì˜¨ ê²½ìš° flagì— flaseë¥¼ ë„£ëŠ”ë‹¤.
                } else if (")]".contains(c + "")) {
                    if (stack.isEmpty()) {
                        flag = false;
                        break;
                    }
                    char last = stack.pop();
                    if ((last == '(' && c == ']') || (last == '[' && c == ')')) {
                        flag = false;
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            //ë°˜ë³µë¬¸ì´ ëë‚¬ì§€ë§Œ stackì— ë¬´ì–¸ê°€ ë‚¨ì•„ìˆë‹¤ë©´ ì§ì´ ë§ì§€ ì•Šìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ flagì— false ëŒ€ì…
            if (!stack.isEmpty())
                flag = false;
            bw.write(flag ? "yes" : "no");
            input = br.readLine();

            if (input.equals("."))
                break;
            bw.write("\n");
        }
        bw.flush();
    }
}
  • í›¨ì”¬ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ì™€ ì†ë„ì—ì„œ ì¢‹ì€ í’€ì´ê°€ ìˆê¸¸ë˜ ë”°ë¼í•´ë´¤ë‹¤.
  • ì•„ìŠ¤í‚¤ ì½”ë“œì—ì„œ â€™(â€™ ì™€ â€™)â€˜ëŠ” 1ì°¨ì´ê°€ ë‚˜ê³  â€™[â€™ ì™€ â€™]â€˜ëŠ” 2ì°¨ì´ê°€ ë‚œë‹¤
  • ê·¼ë° ê²°ê³¼ëŠ” ë³„ ì°¨ì´ê°€ ì•ˆë‚¬ë‹¤.
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out));

        while (true) {
            String input = br.readLine();
            char[] ar = input.toCharArray();
            if (ar.length == 1 && ar[0] == '.')
                break;
            String stack = "";
            for (char c : ar) {
                if ("()[]".contains(c + "")) {
                    if (stack.length() != 0 && (c - stack.charAt(stack.length() - 1) == 2
                            || c - stack.charAt(stack.length() - 1) == 1)) {
                        stack = stack.substring(0, stack.length() - 1);
                    } else {
                        stack += c;
                    }
                }
            }
            bw.write((stack.length() == 0 ? "yes" : "no") + "\n");
        }
        bw.flush();
    }
}
  • ê²°êµ­ ì°¸ì¡°í•œ ì½”ë“œëŠ” char[]ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í–ˆë‹¤.
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.util.Arrays;

public class Main {

    static char[] bracket = {'[', '(', ')', ']'};

    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();

        while(true){
            String origin = br.readLine();
            char[] arr = origin.toCharArray();

            if(arr[0] == '.') break;

            int top = -1;
            char[] stack = new char[100];

            for(char c:arr)
                for(int a=0; a<4; a++)
                    if(c == bracket[a]) {
                        if (top != -1 && (c - stack[top] == 2 || c - stack[top] == 1))
                            --top;
                        else
                            stack[++top] = c;
                    }

            sb.append(top == -1? "yes":"no").append('\n');
        }
        System.out.println(sb);
    }
}

  • 10ì§„ë²•ì´ 123ì´ 110^2+ 210^1 + 3*10^3ì´ ë“¯ í•œ ê¸€ìì”© ë–¼ì„œ ê° íŒ©í† ë¦¬ì–¼ ìë¦¬ ê°’ì„ ê³±í•´ì„œ ë”í•´ì¤€ë‹¤.
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out));

        int[] ar = new int[10];
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            ar[i] = i < 2 ? 1 : ar[i - 1] * i;
        }

        while (true) {
            int n = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine()), result = 0;
            if (n == 0)
                break;
            for (int i = 1; n > 0; i++, n /= 10) {
                int temp = n % 10;
                result += ar[i] * temp;
            }
            bw.write(result + "\n");
        }
        bw.flush();
    }
}
